items.sentence: Aren\'t you going to be in Boston this weekend?
Aren\'t you going to eat the rest of your stew?
I understand you\'re going to Boston next week.
It\'s quite clear to me that that is the truth.
I suspect Tom doesn\'t have to do that anymore.
I suspect Tom doesn\'t need to do that anymore.
I suspect Tom doesn\'t want to do that anymore.
I think it\'s time for me to turn on the radio.
Tom goes to Boston three or four times a month.
Tom goes to bed at the same time every evening.
